mapper.select: select from wx_material_article wma, wx_material_news_article wmna where wma.id = wmna.article_id and wmna.news_id=#{newsId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by wmna.top_time desc;
select from wx_material_article wma, wx_material_news_article wmna where wma.id = wmna.article_id and wmna.news_id=#{newsId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by wmna.top_time desc limit #{limit};
select from wx_material_article wma where wma.id not in (select article_id from wx_material_news_article wmna where wmna.news_id=#{newsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}) order by wma.create_time desc;
